metrics_conclusion: Howl at the Moon has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Howl at the Moon has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Mixolydian, C♯ Minor,  and B Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
